decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings:  A721/PM01 Existing Ground Floor and Site Plan;  A721/PM02 Existing Roof Plan; A721/PM03 Existing Front and West Side Elevations ; A721/PM04 Existing Rear and East Side Elevations;  A721/PL01 REV A:  Proposed Ground Floor and Site Plan ;A721/PL02 Proposed Roof Plan; A721/PL03 Proposed Front and West Side Elevations; A721/PL04 Proposed Rear and East Side Elevations ; A721/PL05 Existing and Proposed Street Elevations; A721/PL20 Crittall Doors with Double Glazing; A721/PL21 ASHP / Bin Store G1.2 and Bicycle Store G1.3 Details; A721/P1; Photographs A721/P2: Photographs; A721/P3-4: Photographs; A721/P5-7: Photographs; A721/P8: Photographs ; A721/P9 : Photographs; Heritage, Design and Access Statement; Air Source Heat Pump - Noise Assessment Calculations
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension with spiral wine cellar; Internal alterations to the ground floor including internal and external refurbishment. Replacement boundary fence with palisade fence to the part of the front elevation. Installation of an air source heat pump in front garden
